name: TSAuthentication
summary: The WebAuthn SDK is a client-side SDK that allows you to easily login users with biometrics based on the Transmit WebAuthn APIs.
description: The WebAuthn SDK is a client-side SDK that allows you to easily login users with biometrics based on the Transmit WebAuthn APIs. The SDK does all the heavy lifting to provide secure WebAuthn authentication, while leaving you flexibility to control the authentication logic and user experience.
